thread.title: Up-and-coming company rethinks ski design
thread.title_full: Up-and-coming company rethinks ski design - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Up-and-coming company rethinks ski design
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - Ski season is around the corner, and one Vermonter is trying to get people to rethink the way they get down the slopes.
Cyrus Schenck started RENOUN, an innovative company that's breaking the mold.
Watch the video for more information.
